name: Grow a forest
description:
Grow a forest is a simulation game in which plants grow, mature, spread and die. You can influence the growth of the forest by planting seeds of different types and watch your plants populate the world. Under the hood, plants consume nutrients and have water requirements, so some plants will thrive in certain areas better than others, and too many plants in one area can cause them wither more rapidly.

This project was created for a 2-day no-crunch gamejam.

Created by

Rimme Pijpker, Tom Cosaert, Alex Steenhaut, Cosima Deschamps, Saurabh Patil and Sofie Lindberg.
